mapper.update:
update TBL_HEALTH
DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATION_HOUSEHOLD = #{relationHousehold,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HOUSEHOLD_NAME = #{householdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_JOIN_NCMS = #{isJoinNcms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_JOIN_INSURANCE = #{isJoinInsurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_MAJOR_DISEASES = #{isMajorDiseases,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CHRONIC_DISEASE = #{isChronicDisease,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CONTRACT = #{isContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLLOW_UP_TIMES = #{followUpTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIS_SUBTOTAL = #{thisSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_HOSPITAL = #{totalHospital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NCMS_NUMBER = #{ncmsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_INSURANCE = #{totalInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEDICAL_ASSISTANCE = #{medicalAssistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GOVERNMENT_BOTTOM = #{governmentBottom,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTUAL_REIMBURSEMENT_RATIO = #{actualReimbursementRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMERCIAL_PROPORTION = #{commercialProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OTHER = #{other,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_HEALTH set DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATION_HOUSEHOLD = #{relationHousehold,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSEHOLD_NAME = #{householdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_JOIN_NCMS = #{isJoinNcms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_JOIN_INSURANCE = #{isJoinInsurance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_MAJOR_DISEASES = #{isMajorDiseases,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CHRONIC_DISEASE = #{isChronicDisease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CONTRACT = #{isContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOLLOW_UP_TIMES = #{followUpTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, THIS_SUBTOTAL = #{thisSubtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_HOSPITAL = #{totalHospital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NCMS_NUMBER = #{ncmsNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TOTAL_INSURANCE = #{totalInsurance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEDICAL_ASSISTANCE = #{medicalAssistance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOVERNMENT_BOTTOM = #{governmentBottom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACTUAL_REIMBURSEMENT_RATIO = #{actualReimbursementRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMERCIAL_PROPORTION = #{commercialProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OTHER = #{other,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( select * from tbl_health where id_number=#{idNumber} ORDER BY id desc ) WHERE rownum=1
